data.title: Abhijit S Pandya (Professor, Florida Atlantic University)
data.meta_description: Abhijit S Pandya. University: Florida Atlantic University. Class Title (Code): Professor (9001). Employee Type, Budget Entity, Position Number, FTE, Annual Salary, OPS Term Amount.
data.text:
About Us

Florida Salaries provides an easily searchable database of names, classes, and salaries for individuals who have been employed by Florida State agencies and universities. Our purpose is to provide Florida state employee salary figures in the name of transparency for taxpayers. The data sources are the State of Florida People First personnel information system and Florida State Universities, via Florida Has a Right to Know website.
